Class ApplicationRepository

java.lang.Object
database.ApplicationRepository
All Implemented Interfaces:
CrudRepository<InternshipApplication, String>, Student.AppReadPort
public class ApplicationRepository extends Object implements CrudRepository<InternshipApplication, String>, Student.AppReadPort
In-memory repository for InternshipApplication entities. Also implements Student.AppReadPort for domain-level checks.

      Description copied from interface: CrudRepository
      Retrieves an entity by its unique identifier.

      Returns an Optional containing the entity if found, or an empty Optional if no entity with the given ID exists.

      Specified by:
      findById in interface CrudRepository<InternshipApplication, String>
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the entity to retrieve
      Returns:
      an Optional containing the entity if found, empty otherwise

    • findAll

      public List<InternshipApplication> findAll()
      Description copied from interface: CrudRepository
      Retrieves all entities in the repository.

      Returns an immutable or defensive copy of all entities to prevent external modification of the repository's internal state.

      Specified by:
      findAll in interface CrudRepository<InternshipApplication, String>
      Returns:
      a list containing all entities (never null, may be empty)

    • save

      public InternshipApplication save(InternshipApplication app)
      Description copied from interface: CrudRepository
      Saves an entity to the repository (insert or update).

      Upsert Behavior:

      • If an entity with the same ID exists, it is replaced (update)
      • If no entity with the ID exists, it is added (insert)

      The entity's ID must not be null when saved.

      Specified by:
      save in interface CrudRepository<InternshipApplication, String>
      Parameters:
      app - the entity to save (must not be null, ID must not be null)
      Returns:
      the saved entity

    • saveAll

      public List<InternshipApplication> saveAll(Iterable<InternshipApplication> entities)
      Description copied from interface: CrudRepository
      Saves multiple entities to the repository.

      Convenience method for bulk operations. Each entity is saved using the same upsert logic as CrudRepository.save(Object).

      Specified by:
      saveAll in interface CrudRepository<InternshipApplication, String>
      Parameters:
      entities - the entities to save (must not be null)
      Returns:
      a list of all saved entities in the order they were processed

    • deleteById

      public void deleteById(String id)
      Description copied from interface: CrudRepository
      Deletes an entity by its unique identifier.

      If no entity with the given ID exists, this method has no effect (does not throw an exception).

      Specified by:
      deleteById in interface CrudRepository<InternshipApplication, String>
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the entity to delete

    • deleteAllById

      public void deleteAllById(Iterable<String> ids)
      Description copied from interface: CrudRepository
      Deletes multiple entities by their identifiers.

      Convenience method for bulk deletion. For each ID, if an entity exists, it is removed; otherwise, that ID is silently ignored.

      Specified by:
      deleteAllById in interface CrudRepository<InternshipApplication, String>
      Parameters:
      ids - the collection of identifiers for entities to delete

    • deleteAll

      public void deleteAll()
      Description copied from interface: CrudRepository
      Deletes all entities from the repository.

      Warning: This operation removes all data and cannot be undone. Use with caution, typically only for testing or reset operations.

      Specified by:
      deleteAll in interface CrudRepository<InternshipApplication, String>
